mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart(user_id, dish_id, amount, number, type, create_time,temperature,shot) values (#{userId},#{dishId},#{amount},#{number},#{type},#{createTime},#{temperature},#{shot}) ;
mapper.update:
update shopping_cart
user_id = #{userId},
dish_id = #{dishId},
amount = #{amount},
number = #{number},
type = #{type},
create_time = #{createTime},
temperature = #{temperature},
shot = #{shot}
where dish_id = #{dishId};
UPDATE shopping_cart s JOIN dish d ON s.dish_id = d.id SET s.amount = CAST((d.price * s.number) AS DOUBLE) where s.id>0;
mapper.select: select * from shopping_cart where dish_id = #{dishId} and temperature = #{temperature} and shot = #{shot}
